cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4489, National Forest Restoration and Remediation Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 125 (Friday, July 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SCHRIER:
H.R. 4489.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I of the United States Constitution.
[Page H3634]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

title: National Forest Restoration and Remediation Act
